title: Morning Coffee
detail: Imagine waking up to the smell of a freshly brewed cup of coffee
extended_details: Many people love to make coffee when they wake up in the morning, but how annoying is it that you have to get out of bed in the cold to make that first cup. Imagine instead if your alarm clock didn't just ring to let you know it was time to make your first cup, but if it brewed your first cup for you and you woke up to the smell of a fresh cup of coffee.
